price: Sema: Hakika imefunuliwa kwangu ya kwamba hakika Mungu wenu ni Mungu Mmoja tu. Je! Mmesilimu?.
arabic: قُلۡ إِنَّمَا يُوحَىٰٓ إِلَيَّ أَنَّمَآ إِلَٰهُكُمۡ إِلَٰهٞ وَٰحِدٞۖ فَهَلۡ أَنتُم مُّسۡلِمُونَ
footnotes: Ewe Nabii! Sema: Hakika kiini cha Wahyi aliyo nipa Mwenyezi Mungu ni kwamba hakika nyinyi hamna Mungu isipo kuwa Yeye. Na yote yaliyo bakia niliyo funuliwa yanafuata asili hii. Ikiwa mambo ni hivyo, basi inakuwajibikieni mjisalimishe na mnyenyekee kwa Mwenyezi Mungu peke yake.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: qul innamā yūḥā ilayya annamā ilāhukum ilāhun wāḥidun fahal antum mus'limūna
